name: Xing Tian
description: Xing Tian is a Huge Giant with exceptional combat prowess and impressive durability, equipped with a battleaxe and a shield.
memorable: Its ability to regain health while making it harder to hit during its Dance of the Unyielding makes it a memorable foe.
goals: Xing Tian seeks to dominate the battlefield and instill fear in its opponents.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other powerful giants or serve powerful beings in its domain.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or areas suitable for large creatures.
strengths: Xing Tian possesses high hit points, strong melee damage output, and abilities that enhance its resilience against crowd control.
weaknesses: Its lower Dexterity and Intelligence scores limit its agility and mental capabilities.
attacks: Xing Tian can make up to three attacks in a turn, dealing bludgeoning and slashing damage with a shield slam and battleaxe, respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Dance of the Unyielding, allowing it to regain health and impose disadvantage on enemy melee attacks.
senses: Xing Tian has darkvision and a high passive perception of 16, enabling it to notice hidden threats well.
skills: Xing Tian is proficient in intimidation and perception, using its physical presence to intimidate foes and remain aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Indomitable feature allows resistance to paralysis, restraint, and stun.
Sure-Footed ability grants advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone.
Can perform a Multiattack, making three attacks including a shield slam.
Immunity to frightened condition enhances its resilience.
Strong Constitution contributes to its high hit points.
test_queries: huge giant with battleaxe and shield
powerful giant that heals in combat
giant with ability to regain hit points
